author: tvami
body:
Removal of `DTRecoUncertaintiesRcd` from all GTs

#### PR description:

The obsolete record of `DTRecoUncertaintiesRcd` was removed from all 12_1_X GTs. Request can be seen in the HN msg of [1] and the diffs between the previous and new GTs in [2], as expected it's only in this `DTRecoUncertaintiesRcd` record. Please note that there is a +2 in the version numbering, that is because first the wrong record was removed. I kept the commit for historical reasons. 


[1] 
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4461.html

[2]
Diff GT - New GT
